nodes.text: A male Morseerian worked as a scientist for the Confederacy of Independent Systems along with Nan Pakota and Urshe Torr during the Clone Wars. The three were tasked with overseeing the creation of a biological warfare agent that would affect the clone troopers in the Grand Army of the Republic. Galactic Republic Lieutenant Commander Orson Krennic undertook a mission to the planet Merj to capture the scientists and then use them in a prisoner exchange on Vallt. During the mission this Morseerian was killed whilst Pakota and Torr were captured and taken to Vallt.
